OpenAWars

dev

Introduction

OpenAWars is a open project trying to recreate the feeling given by Advance Wars (by Nintendo). This project is using C++ with SDL (SDL, SDL_image). The project tends to be as possible portable and these following platforms should be supported: Windows, Mac, Linux, GP32X, AmigaOS4.

Game

This documentation is about the Game part of the whole OpenAWars project. Compared to the Editor branch of the project, some functions are not visible, and don't need to be implemented in the Game code. Otherwise all the features are the same.
